title: Second Track Fault on East-West Line

title_translations.zh-Hans: 东西线第二段轨道故障
title_translations.ms: Jalan Kedua Rosak di Laluan Timur-Barat

updates.text: [EWL] CLEARED: Train services between #Tampines and #PasirRis are now operating normally.
[EWL]: Estimate 20 mins additional travelling time between #Tampines and #PasirRis in both directions due to track fault.
